review_data.title: Sunday brunch nice and yummy
review_data.content: Went for a Sunday brunch with friends. Food was really good and large portions. Our waitress charming and fast. Atmosphere was quite relaxed, restaurant wasn't too crowded. Fairly expensive for an easy Sunday brunch à-la-carte. All in all it was nice and delicious.
